body.name: Woolzies 100% Natural Laundry Powder Detergent Soap Scented with Pure Essential Oils Extra Strength Biodegradable Formula, Safe for Sensitive Skin 100 Loads

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: 🌿Woolies 100% Natural Laundry Detergent is free of harmful chemicals and toxins, so it’s good for you and your clothes and good for the environment. Woohoo!
🌿Woolzies laundry detergent gently cleans while softening your clothes and towels, made with naturally-derived plant-based enzymes and it is safe for children.
🌿Plant-Powered Performance! using safe plant-powered ingredients with dirt and stain-fighting enzymes to remove tough stains
🌿Compatible with high efficiency washing machines; no residue
body.description: Woolzies 100% Natural Liquid Laundry Detergent is free of harmful chemicals and toxins, so it’s good for you and good for the environment. Woohoo!Directions: Use one spoonful for an average load and two spoonfuls for a heavily soiled load. Use to pretreat stains.Ingredients: A proprietary blend of Aqua, Washing Soda, Baking Soda, Coconut Soap, Castille Soap, Coco Glucoside, Lauric Glucoside, Citric Acid, Xanthum Gum, Radish Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Lavender Essential Oil, Neroli Essential Oil & Jasmine Essential Oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love all natural products. This cleans the very dirtiest of clothes. And removes greasy stains too. I love the lavender jasmine scent too. Also gentle on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great clean detergent
reviews.reviewText: I had been using another popular brand for years, until they made changes and I couldn’t deal with the scent. I had started looking for a cleaner choice and stumbled upon Woolzies at a local store. The scent is pleasant and not overbearing. My clothes are clean and fresh. I wash several loads a few days a week and the bag lasts over a month. This is my third time purchasing. I wish it was a few dollars cheaper but after trying a few other clean products I keep coming back to this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful, safe, effective choice!
reviews.reviewText: I always buy cleaning and laundry products with the safest ingredients and have had a hard time finding a laundry detergent that smells good naturally and this surpasses my expectations! We love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I am pleased with this product bc it is a gentle laundry cleaner, it lasts a long time, and it leaves a soft scent on the clothing. I happen to think it leaves the clothes very soft after drying. It is a fine powder but that does not detract from my satisfaction. If you have a respiratory condition, be aware that this has a fine powdery consistency. I switch between this product and liquid detergent so this size "jar" seems to last me a long time. If you prefer I think this comes in a liquid form, but I've never tried it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent but too powdery
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try a natural detergent with a scent since I've been using unscented Charlie's Soap for several years. We liked this laundry detergent. The scent is nice and it does a good job cleaning our clothes. I gave it 3 stars because the powder is so fine that every time I scooped it out of its container, a cloud of fine particles would appear in the air and I would often sneeze. Because of that I went back to my unscented detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my front-loader from smelling weird
reviews.reviewText: This detergent works well on clothes. I have a front-loader and many detergents make the machine smell weird. Some leave a residue on the rubber seal. This detergent keeps my machine smelling fresh and leaves no residue. It is the only brand I use now. I am kind of an essential oil nut, and the jasmine scent is wonderful. I think I may try the lemon-lime next time. I gave this 4 stars only because of the container. It is hard to fit my hand inside to use the scoop as the level gets lower. My husband can't get his hand inside the container at all. We just ordered a long-handled tablespoon in hopes of making it easier for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This smells Amazing! I will be purchasing again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I realized my normal laundry detergent (Tide) was causing some serious skin problems (hives, rashes, itchiness), and probably had been for years. I spent HOURS and HOURS researching and trying to find a good laundry detergent option, and was hoping this was it. Well, I just opened the package, and had to dig around (with a butter knife) to find the included scoop. Started my first load of laundry with this detergent. That was about 10 minutes ago. For that entire time I've been scratching my hand, and just barely realized what I was doing. My fingers and knuckles are covered in hives where they came in contact with the inside of the Woolzies detergent package - even though I washed my hands immediately after digging around for the scoop. I am so discouraged!!! Doesn't ANYONE make a laundry detergent that is truly for people with sensitive skin?!? I just hope I can get a refund, at least!Edit to ad the rest of the story:I already had one load of laundry going when I wrote the above review. Here is the rest of my experience with this detergent. Upon opening the package, the scent was almost overpowering. This didn't bother me much because I have no problem with natural lavender oil. However, through the entire wash cycle, there was a very STRONG, HARSH, unpleasant detergent smell - much stronger than any other detergent I've used. When the wash cycle was complete I could feel a slimy, soapy residue on my clothes. I put them through an additional rinse cycle. I could still feel a soapy residue on them. Ditto after another rinse cycle. I put them through yet another rinse cycle with vinegar added to it, then dried them.Wearing my Woolzies-laundered clothes the next day turned me into a miserable, itchy mess. I ran the clothes through a full wash cycle with just vinegar. My clothes STILL are causing itchy skin reactions. After more than 8 hours in the wash, with less than one scoop of this detergent in hot water. Basically, Woolzies has RUINED all my laundry washed with it. Even Tide residue was not this difficult to remove!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not what I expected and delivery too expensive
reviews.reviewText: No smell and you must use hot water.
